name: Attach-Mend
description:
Fix the issues in your house before your Mrs gets home, but first you need to find the attachments to your multi-tool. Then you will need to find the parts for each job. Your first job is to fit a shelf in the living room.

WASD - Move player
Left Shift - Run
E - Pick up / Drop
Left Mouse button - Use Multi-tool
Right Mouse button - Aim Multi-tool
Tab - Change attachment

This is the best I could do for the Game Creator 2022 Game Jam. Built with Unity and Game Creator.

There are a lot of bugs that need fixing, plus more jobs added to the player's list. There will also be a timer for when your wife/girlfriend gets home, the jobs will need to be finished by then. If they are finished before she gets home, then you will have time to carry on with your game development...

The upstairs area is out of bounds at the moment.
